title: Japan to attend G20 meet, no comment on Russia's participation -finance minister - Reuters
content: Japan to attend G20 meet, no comment on Russia's participation -finance minister  Reuters
description: Japan is preparing to attend a gathering of financial leaders from the Group of 20 economic powers next week, its finance minister said on Friday, as Western nations sought the expulsion of Russia from the forum and said they would skip sessions where Moscow is represented.
